response:
Ipsilateral left pupil-involving oculomotor palsy with contralateral (right) spastic hemiparesis, contralateral hemisensory loss, and right limb ataxia localise to a single left midbrain lesion affecting the oculomotor fascicle, cerebral peduncle, and adjacent tegmental pathways. A separate left RAPD with severe visual acuity loss indicates an additional left optic nerve lesion.

lesion_locations = ["left midbrain", "left optic nerve"]
